description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.QsCRXffpsDoMvPnT]{Basic Mods}

Your drone is equipped with two robotic arms with simple hands. They can perform most functions that your arms can perform (such as opening doors, typing on a keypad, wielding a weapon, or attempting skill checks that require manual dexterity), but attacks made with them take a â€“4 penalty.
